title: Alone on the ice: Mass. native becomes first American woman to reach South Pole solo and unsupported
author: Samantha Genzer
bullets: Local News Monet Eliastam completed a 700-mile, 57-day journey across Antarctica, hauling 250 pounds of gear and sharing daily updates with followers along the way.
Monet Eliastam arrives at her final destination — the South Pole.

title: Patriots open as underdogs against Seahawks in Super Bowl LX predictions

title: A $2M schoolhouse near the Berkshires lists for the first time in over three decades
author: Megan Johnson
bullets: Real Estate 552 Twin Lakes Road is known as the Taconic School House.
